name: hang
title: Hang
description: Quickly create a meeting invite out of thin air
author: tylerj

commands.name: hang
commands.title: Hang
commands.subtitle: Create a hang link
commands.description: Quickly create a meeting invite out of thin air

preferences.name: meetingPlatform
preferences.title: Meeting Platform
preferences.description: Choose which platform to use for creating meeting links

preferences.name: googleClientId
preferences.title: Google OAuth Client ID (Optional)
preferences.description: Override the default Client ID. Most users don't need to set this - the extension uses a shared Client ID. Only set this if you want to use your own OAuth app.

preferences.name: googleClientSecret
preferences.title: Google OAuth Client Secret (Optional)
preferences.description: Override the default Client Secret. Most users don't need to set this - the extension uses a shared Client Secret. Only set this if you want to use your own OAuth app.

preferences.name: zoomAccessToken
preferences.title: Zoom Access Token (Optional)
preferences.description: Pre-generated Zoom access token. If provided, this will be used directly. Otherwise, the extension will generate tokens using Account ID, Client ID, and Client Secret. You can also set ZOOM_ACCESS_TOKEN in a .env file for development.

preferences.name: zoomAccountId
preferences.title: Zoom Account ID (Optional)
preferences.description: Your Zoom Account ID from your Server-to-Server OAuth app. Required if not using Access Token. Get this from https://marketplace.zoom.us/develop/create (App Credentials tab). You can also set ZOOM_ACCOUNT_ID in a .env file for development.

preferences.name: zoomClientId
preferences.title: Zoom Client ID (Optional)
preferences.description: Your Zoom Client ID from your Server-to-Server OAuth app. Required if not using Access Token. Get this from https://marketplace.zoom.us/develop/create (App Credentials tab). You can also set ZOOM_CLIENT_ID in a .env file for development.

preferences.name: zoomClientSecret
preferences.title: Zoom Client Secret (Optional)
preferences.description: Your Zoom Client Secret from your Server-to-Server OAuth app. Required if not using Access Token. Get this from https://marketplace.zoom.us/develop/create (App Credentials tab). You can also set ZOOM_CLIENT_SECRET in a .env file for development.

preferences.name: autoOpenLink
preferences.title: Auto-open Link
preferences.label: Auto-open Link
preferences.description: Automatically open the meeting link in your browser after creating it

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
